member.name: T:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2
member.summary: Represents A simple LFU based Cache that supports data expiry.

member.name: E:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.EmptyCacheEvent
member.summary: Raised when CacheCrow is empty.Note: It is also periodically raised by Cleaner when CacheCrow is empty.

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.Initialize(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes CacheCrow, creates a directory '_crow' in root if not present.
member.param: Count of total entries in Active(in-memory) CacheCrow
Milli-seconds before each entry in Active CacheCrow is expired
Milli-seconds before each entry in Dormant(disk) CacheCrow is expired
Milli-seconds before Cleaner cleans Dormant CacheCrow. Note: Cleaner is called after every cleanersnoozetime milli-seconds

member.name: P:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.GetCacheCrow
member.summary: Returns instance of ICacheCrow if it has been initialized

member.name: P:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.ActiveCount
member.summary: Gets number of entries in Active CacheCrow

member.name: P:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.Count
member.summary: Gets total number of entries in CacheCrow

member.name: P:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.PreviousCount
member.summary: Gets a previously calculated total number of entries in CacheCrow. Note: Should be considered if realtime values are not required.

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.Clear
member.summary: Removes all entries from CacheCrow, including entries in dormant cache and raises EmptyCacheEvent.

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.Add(`0,`1)
member.summary: Inputs entry in Active CacheCrow if its size is not exceeded else adds the entry in Dormant CacheCrow.

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.Update(`0,`1)
member.summary: Searches the key in both Active and Dormant CacheCrow and if found then updates the value.
member.returns: True if value was updated else false

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.ActiveLookUp(`0)
member.summary: Checks if key is present in the Active CacheCrow.
member.returns: True if key is found in Active CacheCrow, else false

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.LookUp(`0)
member.summary: Checks if key is present in CacheCrow(Active+Dormant)
member.returns: True if key is found, else false

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.ActiveRemove(`0)
member.summary: Removes the entry from Active CacheCrow corresponsing to the key.
member.param: The key to corresponding value to remove
member.returns: If removed then returns removed value as CacheData, else returns empty CacheData

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.Remove(`0)
member.summary: Removes the entry from CacheCrow(Active+Dormant) corresponsing to the key.
member.param: The key to corresponding value to remove
member.returns: If removed then returns removed value as CacheData, else returns empty CacheData

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.GetValue(`0)
member.summary: Lookups the key in Active+Dormant CacheCrow, if found then increments the frequency.
member.returns: If V is reference type and it is present then Object V else if V is value-type and it is not present then default value of V

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.GetActiveValue(`0)
member.summary: Lookups the key in Active CacheCrow, if found then increments the frequency. Note: LFU maybe performed and entries maybe swapped between Active and Dormant CacheCrow.
member.returns: If V is reference type and it is present then Object V else if V is value-type and it is not present then default value of V

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes and writes the entries in Active CacheCrow to Dormant CacheCrow.

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.LoadCache
member.summary: Loads entries from Dormant CacheCrow into Active CacheCrow

member.name: M:CacheCrow.Cache.CacheCrow`2.PerformLFUAndAdd
member.summary: Tries to add value from Dormant CacheCrow to Active CacheCrow using LFU.

member.name: T:CacheCrow.Cache.ICacheCrow`2
member.summary: Interface for implementing LFU based cache

member.summary: Inputs entry in Active CacheCrow if its size is not exceeded else adds the entry in Dormant CacheCrow.
